name: updatePostTrx
description: A group of post transaction loading batches meant to isDeposit, transactionType, invoiceStatusId & inAging flags

name: isCommercial
description: Batch to classify accounts as commerical or non-commerical. Commercial account are account numbers which satisfies the pattern ^3[0-9]{8}

name: updateParentInvoiceNo
description: Batch to update parent invoice number which eventually becomes invoice_reference in kv_payments

name: updateIsInvoiceAndIsCredit
description: Batch to update post keys for invoices and credit notes
